category: news
title: "Should AI be permitted in college classrooms? Four scholars weigh in"
excerpt: "One of the most intense discussions taking place among university faculty is whether to permit students to use artificial intelligence in the classroom. To gain perspective on the matter, The Conversation reached out to four scholars for their take on AI as a learning tool and the reasons why they will or won't be making it a part of their classes."
